trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around December 30th 2006
divs: sighting detailson 12\30\06 we were returning from cincinnati at approximately 10:30pm. upon pulling into our driveway on s. state 101, i was exiting the passenger side of the vehicle when i noticed a remarkably fast moving object to the north. it was a steady burning amber light. it shot across the sky and came to a screeching halt, then started to do a 180degree turn. the sky was slightly hazy. it was not an airplane that i could ascertain as it was not blinking. it was steady burning and moving at extraordinary velocity. uncertain what the altitude was. it appeared to be northwest of richmond. after it did the 180, it shot up and disappeared.
